ygData.msgSnippet: As a cleric, I m a great puller... all I have to do is sit and med :P Baroness Dagdas Darlin 58th Degree Cleric Povar Server Guild Leader Royal Order of
ygData.messageBody:
As a cleric, I'm a great puller... all I have to do is sit and med :P

Baroness Dagdas' Darlin
58th Degree Cleric
Povar Server
Guild Leader Royal Order of Norrath

On Tue, 30 Dec 2003 15:20:18 -0800
"STG2(SW) Pierce" <piercer@...> wrote:
>Sara says it all in this quote- "Remember, all classes have their
>limitations, and it is how you handle those limitations that makes
>the
>character an asset." I've played with rangers..even clerics..that can
>pull
>just as well if not better than bards or monks and vice versa, it
>just comes
>down to how well you play your class and most of all having fun.
>
>Bloodbrood Deathdiscple <Cealitus>
>Shadowknight of the 29th Season
>
